outputs.output_descr:
Community Micro Hydro for Sustainable Livelihood though the following outputs
1.Consultation and stakeholder meeting for Policy framework for Community based energy service
2. Set up of community micro hydro delivery model
3. Training and awareness programs to the sengor community entreprenuers in establishment , management and operation of small scale businesses through establishment of the Community Colateral fund

project_descr: PIMS 739 CC MSP : Community Micro Hydro for Sustainable Livelihood
project_title: PIMS 739 CC MSP:Communty Micro Hydro for Sust Livelihood
